goal_name: An inclusive society which upholds human dignity and where the rights of all Ni-Vanuatu including women, youth, vulnerable groups and the elderly are supported, protected and promoted in our legislation and institutions
target_name: Prevent and eliminate all forms of violence and discrimination against women, children and vulnerable groups
GoalDescription: An inclusive society which upholds human dignity and where the rights of all Ni-Vanuatu including women, youth, vulnerable groups and the elderly are supported, protected and promoted in our legislation and institutions
PolicyObjectiveDescription: Prevent and eliminate all forms of violence and discrimination against women, children and vulnerable groups
source_organisation_1: 2012 Pacific Living Conditions Survey (Hybrid) - VNSO and SPC
source_organisation_2: 2012 Melanesian Well-being Indicators Pilot Study Report - VNSO
